name: Add-Ons & Accessories Upsell Pop-up
description: Interactive upsell solution that displays contextual accessory recommendations during sales order entry through pop-up interfaces. Automatically suggests complementary items (cases, cleaners, display stands) based on the primary item or item class, with price-aware filtering and one-click add functionality. Prevents deletion of parent items with attached add-ons and maintains parent-child relationships for accurate order tracking and reporting.

constraints.value: Custom Records, Server-Side Scripting, Classes, Multi-Price Levels
